A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The casino subplot could have been removed and the screenplay could have been tighter and more refined.  But\, it's a good addition to the Star Wars universe and worthy of a watch.  If you cut the fat\, it's probably better than The Force Awakens.  Otherwise\, it's on par with TFA and stuck in the middle between the prequels and the originals as far as overall quality.
